description: It’s a “Bareback Sex Fest” when Lucas Entertainment bring together a group of its horniest and raw-fucking porn stars, packs them up, and sends them to a cabin in upstate New York to do what they do best: have some hot and heavy bareback sex, and that includes some ass-splitting double-penetration! Jed Athens, Rafael Carreras, Marcus Isaacs, Shane Frost, Draven Torres, Hot Rod, and Fabio Stallone: no one could ask for a sexier group of men to suck, fuck, and blow their raw loads in an unforgettable “Bareback Sex Fest”!
title: Watch a Sneak Preview of Bareback Sex Fest
